parameters.query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE user_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' AND status != 'done' AND due_date = CURRENT_DATE) as tasks_due_today,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE user_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' AND status = 'done' AND updated_at::date = CURRENT_DATE) as tasks_completed_today,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reminders WHERE user_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' AND remind_at::date = CURRENT_DATE AND status = 'pending') as reminders_today,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM events WHERE user_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' AND start_time::date = CURRENT_DATE AND status != 'cancelled') as events_today;

SELECT id, title, due_date, priority, status
FROM tasks
WHERE user_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001'
  AND status != 'done'
  AND due_date = CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at ASC;

SELECT id, title, start_time, end_time, location
FROM events
WHERE user_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001'
  AND start_time::date = CURRENT_DATE
  AND status != 'cancelled'
ORDER BY start_time ASC;
